patthana12.14:1.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe…
patthana12.14:1.1_1: nasaraṇaṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe
patthana12.14:1.1_2: ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana12.14:2.1: Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana12.14:3.1_0: Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ naahetukañceva
patthana12.14:3.1_1: nana ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ
patthana12.14:3.1_2: paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṁ nahetuvippayuttañceva nana ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana12.14:3.1_3: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana12.14:5.1: Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
